name: Sandro's Super Sprint
description:
You are two players in the head of one driver. Sandro's Super Sprint is a two player only game where you need to steel the wheel to the other player. Everytime you take the control of the car you give the other player the points he earned while driving. When you fail you give to your opponent your points. Take the control strategically to win.

ControlsUp arrow: Take control of the car
Left arrow: Move Left (wow!) 
Right arrow: Move Right (amazing!) 

A game by
Joel Launer - Art & Code
Neil Marietta - Code
Nicolas Graber - Sound Design 
Sandro Dall'Aglio - Game Design

Tips

  • Coins cash the score
  • Taking control of the car increase the speed
